Article Title: Centre intervenes in Infosys graduate onboarding delays, directs Karnataka to investigate
Article Text: The Ministry of Labour has instructed the Karnataka State Labour Commissioner’s Office to take action. NITES president Harpreet Singh Saluja announced that they would protest if Infosys breaches the new joining date of October 7, 2024.
Article Summary: The Ministry of Labour has instructed the Karnataka State Labour Commissioner’s Office to take action. NITES president Harpreet Singh Saluja announced that they would protest if Infosys breaches the new joining date of October 7, 2024.

Article Title: The Lion King director calls AI in films "Wild West": “I think what AI will do is….”
Article Text: Rob Minkoff, co-director of Disney's 'The Lion King,' sees artificial intelligence as a tool that could democratise filmmaking by reducing production costs and enabling new voices. He acknowledges concerns over copyright infringement and suggests creating a body to protect intellectual property.
Article Summary: Rob Minkoff, co-director of Disney's 'The Lion King,' sees artificial intelligence as a tool that could democratise filmmaking by reducing production costs and enabling new voices. He acknowledges concerns over copyright infringement and suggests creating a body to protect intellectual property.

Article Title: Shark Tank judge Radhika Gupta on Rs 2,200 crore trading scam: ‘There is no fast route to riches…’
Article Text:
Stick to “dal-chawal” investing

Assam CM urged people to to be alert

Assam police recently uncovered a Rs 2,200 crore stock market scam where a 22-year-old Bishal Phukan duped citizens on false promises of high investment returns . Now, Edelweiss Mutual Fund CEO and MD, Radhika Gupta has shared important advice for all the investors out there.Referring to the Rs 2,200 core trading scam, Gupta has advised the investors that there is no fast route to riches and one should stick to dal-chawal investing .“2200 crores of fraud is heartbreaking stuff. How many reminders do we need that there is no fast route to riches… and usually if such a route is advertised with fancy cars in tow… it leads to fatal crashes. Stay safe. And stick to dal-chawal investing. It works. Without indigestion,” said Gupta in a post on X (formerly known as Twitter).The "dal-chawal" funds mentioned by Gupta are well-diversified funds that invest in a wide range of sectors. They are designed to deliver steady returns, regardless of market volatility. Just like the Indian staple, these funds are reliable and less risky for investors.Meanwhile, Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma has urged the public to be alert against investing through brokers who do not follow due legal procedures.Highlighting that claims of doubling money with minimal effort are typically fraudulent, Sarma said “The promise of doubling your money with additional interest is a way of fraudsters.”“According to the law, no one is authorised to conduct stock broking in such a deceptive manner. They (certain apps) are completely unlawful. Today, the police have acted, and in the future, they will intensify it. There is a proper procedure for engaging in stock broking—such as opening a Demat account. These apps should be ignored. They lure people with attractive returns initially and then scam them. So, please stay away from these,” he advised.
Article Summary: Assam police recently uncovered a Rs 2,200 crore stock market scam where a 22-year-old Bishal Phukan duped citizens on false promises of high investment returns. Edelweiss Mutual Fund CEO and MD, Radhika Gupta has shared important advice for all the investors out there.

Article Title: YouTube Music for Android gets animated splash screen
Article Text: The popular music streaming platform , YouTube Music has introduced a new animated splash screen for Android users. The updated splash screen replaces the static image that previously greeted users upon opening the app.The animated splash screen features a colourful and dynamic visual that showcases the app's logo and a variety of music-related elements. This new design aims to create a more engaging and visually appealing user experience .The animated splash screen is now available for Android users who have the latest version of YouTube Music installed. It is expected to be rolled out to iOS users in the near future.This update is just one of many recent changes to YouTube Music. The platform has also introduced new features such as personalised playlists, improved search functionality, and enhanced offline listening capabilities. These updates demonstrate YouTube Music's commitment to providing a high-quality and user-friendly music streaming experience.YouTube Music to soon roll out multi-song radio creator featureRecently, it was reported that it is expanding its features to offer users more control over their listening experience. According to 9to5Google, the platform is currently testing a new multi-song radio creator within its Quick Picks section.Previously, the Quick Picks carousel suggested single songs for radio creation. However, the updated feature allows users to select multiple tracks from a list of their recently played songs. By tapping the plus icon next to each desired track, users can create a custom radio station tailored to their specific preferences.
Article Summary: The animated splash screen is now available for Android users who have the latest version of YouTube Music installed. It is expected to be rolled out to iOS users in the near future. The update is just one of many recent changes to YouTube Music.

Article Title: Nothing teases new product, here’s what it could be
Article Text: Nothing has teased the launch of a new audio product that is likely to be its first open-ear headphones . The company shared an image on social media showing what appears to be part of a transparent earbud stem, hinting at its signature see-through design aesthetic.The company captioned the teaser "Coming soon. A new world of possibilities," suggesting the product may introduce new features or use cases for Nothing's audio offerings.No specific launch date has been announced, but the teaser indicates the release is imminent.While Nothing has not officially confirmed the product name, industry insiders believe this could be the rumored " Nothing Ear Open " that was recently spotted on certification websites. The teaser image reveals a white body with visible internal components and what looks like a microphone grille, consistent with Nothing's established design language.This launch would mark Nothing's entry into the open-ear headphone category, expanding its audio lineup beyond the existing in-ear true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds. Open-ear designs typically sit outside the ear canal, allowing users to remain aware of their surroundings while listening.Nothing has been rapidly expanding its product portfolio in 2024. The company has already launched two smartphones this year - the Nothing Phone 2a and Phone 2a Plus - along with multiple audio products under its CMF sub-brand.The rumoured open-ear headphones would join Nothing's existing audio lineup, which includes the Ear and Ear (a) earbuds.
Article Summary: Nothing shared an image on social media showing what appears to be part of a transparent earbud stem. The company captioned the teaser "Coming soon. A new world of possibilities" No specific launch date has been announced, but the teaser indicates the release is imminent.

Article Title: SBI chairman calls out a major 'tech challenge' that banks are facing
Article Text: State Bank of India ( SBI ) Chairman CS Setty has warned of growing cybersecurity challenges and the need for improved digital literacy in the banking sector. While investments in cybersecurity are on the rise, the availability of professional support for these activities remains limited, posing a significant hurdle for banks as they roll out digital systems.Speaking at FIBAC 2024, a banking summit organized by the Indian Banks’ Association and FICCI, Setty emphasized the importance of addressing these challenges to ensure the successful transition to digital technologies and protect systems from cyber threats.SBI has been able to create resilience in its systems while maintaining a positive customer experience, despite the complexities of integrating legacy systems with newer technologies. The bank has collaborated with fintech players and software solution providers to reimagine customer journeys and streamline processes.Setty also discussed the need for banks to prioritize spending on technology that delivers tangible benefits, such as meeting regulatory requirements, acquiring new business, and enhancing customer experience. He cautioned against excessive spending on technology upgrades that do not contribute to overall transformation.Investments in technology should focus on creating end-to-end experiences and processes that lead to operational efficiency. Additionally, banks should assess whether their digital interfaces are capable of handling large transaction volumes and consider redeploying staff to areas where they can contribute to business growth.By addressing these challenges and making strategic investments in technology, banks can effectively navigate the digital landscape and ensure the security and efficiency of their operations.
Article Summary: State Bank of India ( SBI ) Chairman CS Setty has warned of growing cybersecurity challenges and the need for improved digital literacy in the banking sector. While investments in cybersecurity are on the rise, the availability of professional support for these activities remains limited, posing a significant hurdle for banks.

Article Title: Google's 'US troubles' may have come to haunt it in the UK too
Article Text: Google is facing regulatory challenges from both the UK and US over alleged anti-competitive practices in digital advertising. The UK's Competition and Markets Authority claims Google has been using its market power to favor its own services, potentially leading to substantial fines or required changes in behavior.
Article Summary: The UK's Competition and Markets Authority claims Google has been using its market power to favor its own services. This could lead to substantial fines or required changes in behavior. Google is facing regulatory challenges from both the UK and US over alleged anti-competitive practices in digital advertising.

The widely popular Telegram-based crypto tap-to-earn game has just revealed the code word and card combinations that could earn you up to 6 million tokens for free.Since its launch in March 2024, Hamster Kombat has seen explosive growth, attracting over 200 million users globally. The viral clicker game centres around a Hamster who acts as the CEO of a simulated virtual crypto exchange.Players are tasked with supporting this ambitious rodent by mining coins and upgrading the exchange’s level.As a reward for their efforts, players can earn free bonuses. Mining in Hamster Kombat is simple—just tap on the Hamster icon until your energy bar is depleted.The Daily Cipher Code and Combo Card are special challenges within the game designed to reward players with even more tokens. The Daily Cipher Code is a task where players must decipher a word using Morse code. Successfully cracking the code within the 24-hour time limit can earn you 1 million coins.The Daily Combo Card is a challenge that requires players to correctly choose three cards from the game’s upgrade categories: PR & Team, Markets, Legal, Specials, and Web3. Completing this challenge can net you an additional 5 million coins. Like the Cipher Code, the Combo Card is updated daily.The Hamster Kombat Daily Cipher code for today is “WITHDRAW.” Enter the code using the Morse sheet given below and earn up to 1 million coins.▬ Long Tap● Short TapW: ● ▬ ▬I: ● ●T: ▬H: ● ● ● ●D: ▬ ● ●R: ● ▬ ●A: ● ▬W: ● ▬ ▬To activate the Daily Cipher mode, simply go to the "Exchange" tab and press the "Daily Cipher" button. Once activated, enter the daily Morse code using the following tapping patterns:
Article Summary: Hamster Kombat Daily Cipher code for September 03, 2024 is WITHDRAW. Today's morse code is: WIT HDRAW. To solve today’s cipher:Tap once for a dot (•).Tap and hold for a dash (—).Wait at least 1.5 seconds between each letter sequence to ensure proper registration in the game.

Article Title: Elon Musk’s X is hiring cybersecurity professionals: Read the job listing here
Article Text:
Read the

job listing

here:

Senior/Staff Security Engineer, Offensive Security

Who we are:

What you’ll do:

As a security engineer, you will:

Scope prospective engagements, leading engagements from kickoff through remediation.



Perform network, web, and mobile application testing, source code reviews, threat analysis and wireless network assessments.



Operate and maintain the vulnerability scanners.



Lead and participate in red team exercises to emulate adversarial activity.



Recognize and safely utilize attacker tools, tactics, and procedures.



Develop scripts, tools, or methodologies to enhance offensive security processes.



Drive security directions and solutions in collaboration with other teams.



Use data to drive identification of risk areas and solutions.



Who you are:

5 or more years of experience in network penetration testing, mobile and web app assessments, shell scripting and exploit development.



Knowledge of tools used for wireless, web application, and network security testing.



Experience reviewing web and mobile application source code for security issues.



Tested security of cloud security infrastructure including applications deployed on cloud.



Deep understanding of Linux/Mac/Windows operating systems, including bash and powershell.



Knowledge of at least one of the following languages: Scala (preferred), Go, Python, or Java.

Social media platform, X (formerly known as Twitter) has announced that it is actively hiring for roles within its security and safety teams. This comes after a period of significant layoffs that began in 2022. According to the job posting, the company is seeking to hire employees to assist with content moderation and platform security .As reported by TechCrunch, X posted multiple job openings in the last month.All the job openings were divided between its safety and cybersecurity teams. Safety team positions range from director of strategic response to government affairs managers. On the cybersecurity side, X is seeking to hire several security engineers and a threat intelligence specialist.This rehiring effort marks a significant shift in X's strategy and could signal a renewed focus on user safety and well-being. It remains to be seen how these new hires will impact the platform's overall approach to content moderation and user protection.To recall, in April 2023, Musk told the BBC that Twitter's workforce had been reduced by 6,000 employees in just six months, leaving only around 1,500 employees remaining after the layoffs were completed.Salary Range: $154,000-259,000 USDX serves our community of users and customers by working tirelessly to preserve free expression and choice, create limitless interactivity, and create a marketplace that enables the economic success of all its participants.You will be responsible for helping maintain the security of X’s networks, products, offices, and data centers. You will help identify and manage risks and work with partner teams to reduce and manage them. You will secure, advocate, and help build secure-by-default systems and infrastructure that close off entire classes of security problems.You care about security and building a secure environment for the people using X everyday. You are curious, comfortable digging into the details, have experience with the tools of the trade, and are eager to help others protect our systems. Ideally, you have many of the following (but need not have all):
Article Summary: Social media platform, X (formerly known as Twitter) has announced that it is actively hiring for roles within its security and safety teams. This comes after a period of significant layoffs that began in 2022. According to the job posting, the company is seeking to hire employees to assist with content moderation and platform security.

Article Title: Did Pavel Durov went under the knife? His transformation raises eyebrows
Article Text:
Pavel Durov's rise to fame

Durov's recent legal troubles

Pavel Durov’s transformation: Then vs. Now

Social media reactions on Durov’s transformation

Impact of public scrutiny

Also read

Pavel Durov, CEO of Telegram , has recently become the subject of widespread speculation after older photos of him resurfaced online. These images have led many to wonder whether the billionaire entrepreneur underwent plastic surgery to enhance his appearance. Adding to the intrigue, Durov was recently arrested in France, raising further questions about the man behind the popular messaging app.Pavel Durov, a 39-year-old entrepreneur originally from Russia, is best known as the founder and CEO of Telegram, a messaging app launched in 2013.Telegram quickly gained popularity for its strong emphasis on user privacy, offering end-to-end encryption and other security features that set it apart from competitors. As of now, Forbes estimates Durov's net worth to be around $15.5 billion. Despite his success in the tech industry, Durov has managed to maintain a relatively low profile—until now.Durov's recent arrest in Paris has added a new layer of complexity to his public image. He was detained in France on charges of suspected complicity in running an online platform involved in illicit activities, including child exploitation, drug trafficking, and fraud. While these allegations are serious, it is the sudden focus on Durov's physical transformation that has captured the internet's attention.Pavel Durov has been active on social media platforms like Instagram since 2011, regularly sharing photos from his travels around the world. In his recent posts, Durov appears with a full head of hair and a toned physique, often posing shirtless in various locations. However, these recent images stand in stark contrast to older photos where Durov was seen with a noticeably receding hairline.The drastic change in his appearance has fueled rumours that Durov may have undergone plastic surgery, including a possible hair transplant. A popular post on X (formerly Twitter) by a well-known account shared a side-by-side comparison of Durov's old and new photos, sparking a flurry of online discussions. The post reads, "Pavel Durov (Telegram CEO) before his hair transplant and plastic surgery," and has since gone viral.The speculation around Durov's transformation has been met with a variety of opinions online. On Reddit, users have debated whether the changes in Durov's appearance are the result of surgical procedures or simply better grooming and styling.One Reddit user commented, "This isn't a hair transplant. His hair is too thick and full to have this kind of drastic change from a HT. Most likely he's wearing a hair system (wig)."Another user added, "There's speculation that it's not a transplant, but rather a hair system because his hair loss was much more advanced in the first picture, so when the operation happens, the resulting hairdo never looks as full as his."Some users believe the changes are the result of plastic surgery, with one theorising, "This is well-done surgery."However, not everyone is convinced that surgery is involved. One Reddit user opined, "Honestly, I think a lot of the facial 'changes' are simply due to the much better angle and lighting in the second photo."As the speculation continues, it's clear that Durov's transformation—whether natural or assisted—has caught the public's eye. The intense scrutiny of his appearance highlights the challenges that come with being in the spotlight, especially for someone as private as Durov. Whether or not he has undergone any procedures, the discussions around his looks reflect a broader societal fascination with image and success.
Article Summary: Pavel Durov, 39, is the founder and CEO of Telegram, a messaging app launched in 2013. He has recently become the subject of widespread speculation after older photos of him resurfaced online. These images have led many to wonder whether the billionaire entrepreneur underwent plastic surgery to enhance his appearance.

Coin Master is a popular mobile game available for free on both Android and iOS platforms, offering a unique blend of village-building, social interaction, and virtual slot machine mechanics. The primary objective of the game is to build and upgrade villages, while simultaneously attacking and defending against those belonging to other players, including your friends.To excel in Coin Master, players must effectively defend their villages, collect rewards, and progress quickly.The game's core mechanic revolves around a virtual slot machine that awards players with various rewards, including coins, shields, and weapons. In Coin Master, characters embark on time-travelling adventures, adopting roles such as pirates, hippies, kings, warriors, and Vikings, among others.Players accumulate spins, which can be used to earn rewards such as coins, shields, and opportunities to attack or raid other players' villages. Here’s what you can expect from the slot machine:Players can also perform a "Super Bet," wagering multiple spins simultaneously for potentially greater rewards.Players can also earn spins and coins by collecting thematic cards to complete collections, which unlock rewards like pets, spins, and coins; card collection begins at the third village, and cards can be traded with friends to complete sets faster.Pets, including Foxy (increases raid rewards), Rhino (enhances village defence), and Tiger (boosts attack rewards), play a key role by offering various bonuses as they level up. To maintain pets, players need to provide food, which can be obtained from the store, special events, or the slot machine.Spins are crucial in Coin Master as they enable participation in the slot machine. Here are some of the best ways to accumulate spins:If you want to get 120 spins and 14 million coins from the above-listed links, redeem them within three days. Once this is complete, a display box will appear showing the number of links and coins you will receive.Click the green "Collect" button, and all freebies will be added to your in-game inventory.
Article Summary: Coin Master is a popular mobile game available for free on both Android and iOS platforms. The primary objective of the game is to build and upgrade villages, while simultaneously attacking and defending against those belonging to other players, including your friends. The game's core mechanic revolves around a virtual slot machine that awards players with various rewards, including coins, shields, and weapons.

Article Title: When Tesla CEO Elon Musk called Ratan Tata a “gentleman and …”
Article Text:
Tata Nano and the Indian automobile market

Elon Musk praised Ratan Tata

The legacy of the Tata Nano

Also read

In the realm of business and innovation, few figures command as much respect as Tata Group chairman emeritus Ratan Tata. His influence extends far beyond the Indian corporate world, even garnering admiration from Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk . In a 2009 interview with American journalist Charlie Rose , Musk praised Ratan Tata as a "gentleman and a scholar." This moment has recently resurfaced, shedding light on Musk's appreciation for Ratan Tata and his ambitious project, the Tata Nano .The Tata Nano was introduced by Tata Motors in 2008 as the world's cheapest car, with a price tag of just Rs 1 lakh (approximately $2,300 at the time). The car was a pet project of Ratan Tata, designed to make automobile ownership accessible to millions of Indians who had never been able to afford a car. The idea was revolutionary—a small, affordable car that would cater to the vast Indian middle class, providing them with a safe and efficient means of transportation.In the interview with Charlie Rose, which took place shortly after the launch of the Tata Nano, the Tesla CEO was asked about his views on Ratan Tata’s efforts to introduce a low-cost car in India. The interview clip, which has recently gone viral, captures Musk's candid response."Take for a moment Ratan Tata, what he’s doing in India — developing a little sedan for $2300. Where do you put that in the whole equation of where the future of cars is?" asked Rose.Musk responded with a mix of admiration and caution. He began by acknowledging the brilliance behind the Tata Nano project and the character of Ratan Tata himself."I think it's a good idea to have affordable cars, but I think the problem with something like the Nano ... I wouldn't say problem because I think, by the way, it is probably a great idea and Ratan is a gentleman and scholar," Musk said.However, Musk also expressed his concerns about the long-term viability of such a low-cost vehicle, particularly in the context of rising fuel prices. He pointed out that while the initial purchase cost of the Nano was remarkably low, the cost of running the car—particularly fuel costs—could become a significant issue as gasoline prices continued to rise."But where it’s going to become challenging in the future is when the price of gasoline rises, the cost of acquiring the car is much less of an issue than the cost of running the car," the billionnaire explained.Despite the initial excitement surrounding the Tata Nano, the car faced numerous challenges. One of the most significant issues was its branding. While the Nano was intended to be an affordable vehicle for the masses, it was often labeled as "cheap" rather than "affordable." This perception problem, combined with safety concerns and competition from other small cars, led to unimpressive sales figures.The Nano’s production was ultimately discontinued in 2018, marking the end of what was initially seen as a groundbreaking project. The car's journey from inception to discontinuation is often cited as one of the biggest marketing failures in the automobile industry.
Article Summary: The Tata Nano was introduced by Tata Motors in 2008 as the world's cheapest car, with a price tag of just Rs 1 lakh (approximately $2,300 at the time) The car was a pet project of Ratan Tata, designed to make automobile ownership accessible to millions of Indians who had never been able to afford a car. In a 2009 interview with American journalist Charlie Rose, Musk praised Tata as a "gentleman and a scholar"

Article Title: Donald Trump has found a role for Elon Musk in the US government
Article Text: Donald Trump announced his intention to form a government efficiency commission with Elon Musk as its head if he is elected President. The commission will audit the federal government to identify and eliminate fraud and improper payments. Trump also outlined proposals to cut regulations, boost energy production, adopt cryptocurrencies, and reduce corporate taxes for US-based companies.
Article Summary: The commission will audit the federal government to identify and eliminate fraud and improper payments. Trump also outlined proposals to cut regulations, boost energy production, adopt cryptocurrencies, and reduce corporate taxes for US- based companies. The commission will be headed by Elon Musk if he is elected President.

Article Title: Bengaluru-based Dunzo lays off 75% employees, reduces workforce to 50
Article Text:
Dunzo sends email to employees

Reliance Retail-backed Dunzo has laid off 75% of its workforce, reports Financial Express. Citing unknown sources aware of the matter, the report said that the online delivery app now has 50 employees in its core supply and marketplace teams.The job cuts , according to the report, is part of the company's broader effort to curb costs and create cash flow to address mounting liabilities, including overdue salaries to current and former employees and outstanding vendor payments. Layoffs .fyi - the online tracker show that the job cuts were made on August 31, 2024.As per the report, Dunzo has sent an email to its employees informing them about the recent downsizing. In the letter, Dunzo promises to pay pending salaries, severance, leave encashment, and other dues to affected staff as soon as it secures the necessary funds.Dunzo, which started as a concierge service, has undergone multiple shifts and challenges. The company, once valued at $775 million, has been struggling to close a critical funding round. In May this year, Dunzo was reportedly close to securing $22-25 million through a mix of equity and debt from both new and existing investors.In mid-July this year, the company informed its employees that it was in the final stages of closing a deal, expecting to settle dues within 10-15 days. However, the transaction failed to materialize with subsequent emails revealing persistent delays and challenges.The company is now seeking to diversify its revenue sources beyond its primary merchant-focused operations.
Article Summary: Reliance Retail-backed Dunzo has laid off 75% of its workforce, reports Financial Express. The online delivery app now has 50 employees in its core supply and marketplace teams. The company, once valued at $775 million, has been struggling to close a critical funding round.

Article Title: Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal slams Elon Musk’ X: “just look at Twitter’s arm twisting of the Brazilian Supreme Court”
Article Text:
Take a look at Bhavish Aggarwal’s post on X

Elon Musk criticizes Brazil ban on X



Delhi High Court warns Wikipedia

Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal has once again reiterated his stance on fostering the Indian technology sector. Aggarwal took to microblogging site X (formerly known as Twitter) to share his views on the latest report of Delhi High Court slamming Wikipedia over non-compliance with Indian laws.In the post, he wrote “Another proof of why we need to build our tech stack in India. These platforms don’t even comply with Indian laws and then even ignore court judgements!”.But he did not stop there.Aggarwal took aim at Elon Musk 's social media platform, Twitter, leveraging the Wikipedia incident to slam the platform. He said “Also, just look at Twitter’s arm twisting of the Brazilian Supreme Court .”“The more we ignore and justify, more we risk,” he further added.Recently, Brazil Supreme Court banned X after a protracted legal battle. The battle started in April this year when Judge de Moraes directed X to suspend several accounts alleged to be disseminating false information. X's refusal to follow this order resulted in the current suspension in addition to a penalty of 50,000 reais (approximately Rs. 7.47 lakh) for any efforts to bypass the ban, including the use of VPNs.Elon Musk reacted to the announcement with fury, dubbing Moraes as ‘evil dictator’.The Delhi High Court threatened Wikipedia to block the website if it doesn’t comply with India’s laws. Justice Navin Chawla delivered the warning during a hearing related to a defamation case filed by news agency ANI against Wikipedia."If you don't like India, please don't work in India... We will ask government to block your site," Justice Chawla declared, as reported by legal news website Bar and Bench.
Article Summary: Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal took to X (formerly known as Twitter) to share his views on the latest report of Delhi High Court slamming Wikipedia over non- compliance with Indian laws. He also took aim at Elon Musk's social media platform, Twitter, leveraging the Wikipedia incident.
